original_text: And I took my staff Favor, and I broke it, annulling the covenant that I had made with all the peoples.
korean_text: 이에 은총이라 하는 막대기를 취하여 꺾었으니 이는 모든 백성들과 세운 언약을 폐하려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And I took my staff Favor
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 호라라는 내 지팡이를 가져가서

sentences.original_text: that I had made with all the peoples
